Class Database<T>

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.Database<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of entities managed by this database
public class Database<T> extends Object
Generic class for handling database operations on entities of type T. This class provides methods for querying, adding, updating, and deleting entities in a file-based database represented as a JSON-like structure.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Database(Class<T> entity)
    Constructs a Database object for the specified entity type.

    • Database

      public Database(Class<T> entity)
      Constructs a Database object for the specified entity type.
      Parameters:
      entity - the class of the entity to manage

  • Method Details

    • queryByKey

      public T queryByKey(String key)
      Queries the database for an entity by its key (ID).
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the entity to query
      Returns:
      the entity if found, or null if not found

    • queryByKeys

      public List<T> queryByKeys(List<String> keys)
      Queries the database for entities with specified keys.
      Parameters:
      keys - a list of keys to query
      Returns:
      a list of matching entities

    • queryByField

      public List<T> queryByField(String fieldName, String fieldValue)
      Queries the database for entities matching a specific field value.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the name of the field to query
      fieldValue - the value to match
      Returns:
      a list of matching entities

    • queryFuzzyByField

      public List<T> queryFuzzyByField(String fieldName, String fieldValue)
      Queries the database with fuzzy matching on a specific field.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the name of the field to query
      fieldValue - the value to match (partial match)
      Returns:
      a list of matching entities

    • queryByEntity

      public List<T> queryByEntity(T entity)
      Queries the database for entities matching the fields of a given entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to match against
      Returns:
      a list of matching entities

    • getAll

      public List<T> getAll()
      Retrieves all entities from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all entities

    • join

      public List<T> join(List<T> list1, List<T> list2)
      Joins two lists of entities based on their IDs.
      Parameters:
      list1 - the first list of entities
      list2 - the second list of entities
      Returns:
      a list of joined entities

    • delByKey

      public void delByKey(String key)
      Deletes an entity from the database by its key (ID).
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the entity to delete

    • delByFiled

      public void delByFiled(String fieldName, String fieldValue)
      Deletes entities from the database by a specific field value.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the name of the field to check
      fieldValue - the value to match for deletion

    • update

      public void update(T entity)
      Updates an existing entity in the database based on its key (ID).
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity with updated values

    • add

      public void add(T entity)
      Adds a new entity to the database.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to add
